title: [Bug]: Version 2 fails to start login with Godaddy accounts,  v1 worked.
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Yes

### Describe the bug

Teams is sourced via Godaddy,  with v1 everything worked.  with v2 we get an error saying we have a "strange browser".

### What package are you using?

rpm

### Version

2.0.12-1

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1.install client (teams-for-linux-2.0.12-1.x86_64)
2.launch it.   Login window pops up with error message.
3.

This is if a user never had teams-for-linux installed.   I had 1.12.7 installed and using perviously,  when I upgraded to 2.x it worked as expected.

Any new users who did not have 1.x installed previously (logged in with it) gets the error (in the image below).

can' provide more debugging output later (on the road atm).


...
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1.allow user to log in.
2.
3.
...
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/0348954c-9e14-454f-8f0e-a83d2ee86818)
